resources.string: Find the flags of the countries of the Asian continent! The quiz will last until you score 20 points!
Find the flags of the countries of the European continent! The quiz will last until you score 20 points!
Find the flags of the countries of the African continent! The quiz will last until you score 20 points!
Find the flags of the countries that make up the North American continent! The quiz will last until you score 20 points!
Find the flags of the countries that make up the South American continent! The quiz will last until you score 20 points!
Find the flags of the countries that make up Oceania! The quiz will last until you score 20 points!
Congratulations! You have taken to the next level!
